skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the Panasonic HomeHawk skill and Alexa, you can control your Panasonic HomeHawk camera with your voice via Alexa.

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Panasonic ID and register your Panasonic HomeHawk camera to control.

[Step by step guidance]
(1) Complete the registration and check that you can view the camera video properly on your mobile devices.
(2) From the setting screen of HomeHawk app, use or create a Panasonic ID, set your email address and a password for the ID.
(3) From the Alexa app, select the Panasonic HomeHawk Skill to enable. Then the account/link screen for entering the ID/Password for integrating with Amazon Alexa Devices will be displayed. Enter the ID/Password.
(4) Say, "Alexa, Discover."
(5) Now you can operate the supported functions via voice on commands for the Panasonic cameras with your Amazon Alexa devices.

[Supported models]
(1) HomeHawk FRONT DOOR Series* (KX-HN7001/KX-HN7002/KX-HN7003/KX-HN1007)
(2) HomeHawk SHELF (KX-HNC810)
(3) HomeHawk FLOOR (KX-HNC850)
(4) HomeHawk WINDOW (KX-HNC500)

*These models include following individual components: HomeHawk FRONT DOOR KX-HNC700/ OUTDOOR KX-HNC710
NOTE: HomeHawk INDOOR(KX-HNC800/KX-HN1003) are NOT supported.

[Commands]
By saying these commands or similar you can control your Panasonic HomeHawk camera:

Streaming Camera:
- "Alexa, show Entrance Camera."
- "Alexa, show Living Room."
- "Alexa, hide the Living Room."

Get Temperature:
HomeHawk SHELF and FLOOR supported.
- "Alexa, what's the temperature of Living Room?"

Control Privacy Mode:
HomeHawk SHELF and FLOOR supported.
You can control the shutter of the camera.
- "Alexa, turn on Privacy Mode of Living Room."
- "Alexa, turn off Privacy Mode of Living Room."

Light Controls:
HomeHawk FLOOR supported.
You can turned on and off, and adjusted to 3 different levels.
light level : high(70%), medium(50%), low(25%), off(0%)
- "Alexa, turn on / off Living Room light." 
- "Alexa, brighten / dim Living Room light." 


Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).
